name: Human Tradition
description:
A game about saving humanity by changing its tradition.

INFO:

Submission for Quick Play 2022

Game presentation: PDF or Presentation

DISCLAIMER:

This is nothing more than a prototype, so the features included in the presentation are just suggestions, as well as the main story of the game that's written like this just to show how I imagined it to work, but I would like to see what people think, what would they change and how would they like the story to actually work.

MORE ABOUT THE PROJECT:

This is the first game I have ever submitted on a game jam or anywhere, and a lot of the features mentioned above were planned to be in the current version, but that was not possible due to not having a lot of free time because of school and other personal things I had to deal with, and with those times behind me, I would like to expand its features and use its full potential by implementing those features mentioned in the presentation above.
